Brief:          This module is the implementation of HTTP client.
Usage:          GCC: Include the module with "include $(SOURCE_DIR)/middleware/third_party/httpclient/module.mk" in your GCC project Makefile.
                KEIL: Drag the middleware/third_party/httpclient folder to your project. Add middleware/third_party/httpclient/inc to include paths.
                IAR: Drag the middleware/third_party/httpclient folder to your project. Add middleware/third_party/httpclient/inc to include paths.
Dependency:     Please also include LwIP module, and mbedTLS if MTK_HTTPCLIENT_SSL_ENABLE is enabled.
Notice:         None.
Relative doc:   Please refer to the open source user guide under the doc folder for more detail.
Example project:Please find the project under project folder with http_client_ prefix.
